Description

QA Data Analyst - Plano

LERETA is currently seeking a QA Data Analyst - Plano for the Plano, TX location to join our dynamic team of hardworking professionals.

Responsible for online and phone research of real-estate information for property tax, bond and/or HOA issues (e.g., delinquent taxes, lawsuits, P&I, balances, outstanding liens). Obtains working understanding of public record information to research property taxes, bonds, and/or HOA balances for the purpose of reporting to customer.

Research Responsibilities
  • Analyzes legal descriptions/Metes and Bounds/plats and compares to tax maps to confirm and validate identity of property.
  • Researches and gathers information for tax issues, e.g., delinquent tax lawsuits, delinquent and/or missing tax bills.
  • Investigates and reports property value and/or property exemption discrepancies.
  • Keeps up to date on property tax law changes.
  • Manages new orders and pending queue items.
Processing
  • Checks appraisal and tax data files as necessary.
  • Downloads data files via appropriate method.
Data Entry
  • Enters data received form the tax collectors ont
  • Transfers data obtained over phone, fax, e-mail to production and reporting system.

Position Requirements

Minimum Requirements
  • High school diploma or equivalent.
  • Property tax or title experience is preferred.
